metadata.synopsis: This animated compilation features various short films starring Bugs Bunny, who also appears as the host between segments. Among the movie's highlights are the acclaimed "Knighty Knight Bugs," which finds the mischievous rabbit tormenting the ornery Yosemite Sam in the era of King Arthur, and "The Unmentionables," which presents Bugs facing off against the pint-sized gangster Rocky and his dim crony, Mugsy. Other characters that turn up in the collection include Daffy Duck and Porky Pig.
metadata.director: Gerry Chiniquy, Friz Freleng, Phil Monroe

reviews: The Looney Tunes totally hold up, they're still funny, they're still charming, they're still smart.
The great part of this film was the original cartoons
Any chance to sit down and watch these brilliant cartoons again is a cause for celebration.
You're better off saving up for the uncut versions readily available elsewhere.
